    • Method Detail

      • volume

        Schematic.Builder volume(ArchetypeVolume volume)
        Specifies an archetype volume for the world data of the schematic.

        If purely creating a schematic it is recommended to instead use the volume(Extent) method and pass in an extent view (See Extent.getExtentView(com.flowpowered.math.vector.Vector3i, com.flowpowered.math.vector.Vector3i)) of the volume to prevent creating multiple copies of the world data. Likewise, if BiomeTypes are needed to be copied, only volume(Extent) will support copying the BiomeTypes at the desired positions. This also has the same limit for capturing EntityArchetypes, unless otherwise manually placed in with entity(EntityArchetype).

        Parameters:
        volume - The archetype volume
        Returns:
        This builder, for chaining
